Tips and Tricks
===
for working in RStudio

### Useful shortcuts

See the [complete set](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200711853-Keyboard-Shortcuts) of shortcuts for RStudio.  

For a quick reference in RStudio press <code>Alt + Shift + K</code>



### Enumeration of strings
To create automatically enumerated strings use <code>paste0</code> function:
```{r}
a <- c("A", "B", "C")
b <- c("1", "2", "3")
paste0(a, b)
paste0("A",b)
```
